title: silver adc main help

embed.description: ToyotaLucida / Silver 4 75LP / 73W 63L Win Ratio 54% / Jinx - 14W 11L Win Ratio 56%, Leona - 10W 6L Win Ratio 63%, Yasuo - 6W 3L Win Ratio 67%, Caitlyn - 3W 5L Win Ratio 38%, Lucian - 5W 2L Win Ratio 71%

body:
Hi guys,

Can someone please tell me what im doing wrong because im really stuck

replies.body:
You can't tell someone what is wrong just from their OP.GG, in cases like these specifically (Decent CS, seem to have a lead/High KDA.)

My main guesses would be;

You don't know how to use the lead your getting
Your playing too safe/too aggressive at the wrong times (either getting you or your team killed for nothing. and losing off the kind of miss-position.)
You are just now experiencing the fact that ADC isn't properly meta, and were just abusing an ADC meta.
Yeah, I feel like I win lane most of the time and then lose the game.
